abstract: How to move personal information from one MacBook to another, and tips on searching safely online.
snippet: How to move personal information from one MacBook to another, and tips on searching safely online.
lead_paragraph: Q. I have a MacBook Air running Snow Leopard (Mac OS X 10.6.8) and I am considering buying a new MacBook Air with the Mountain Lion (OS X 10.8) operating system. I have accumulated a large number of files over the years in various applications (notably Microsoft Word and Excel, Pages, Keynote and Keychain) on my current machine. Will I be able to readily move these to the new Mac?

headline.main: Moving Into a New MacBook Air
